property.name: titleTimeSlot
property.label: Title
property.description: Title of the panel to be shown on top.

property.name: availableLabel
property.label: Available Label
property.description: Label for available quantity.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object Api Name
property.description: Object Api Name to show records for.

property.name: recordFieldsetNameTimeSlot
property.label: Record Fieldset
property.description: The fieldset to be used to filter.

property.name: defaultFieldValuesTimeSlot
property.label: Default Field Values
property.description: The default values to pupulate record with.

property.name: transactionType
property.label: Transaction Type
property.description: Transaction of which capcity needs to be shown.

property.name: siteTransactionType
property.label: Onsite Transaction Type
property.description: Transaction of which capcity needs to be shown.

property.name: noDataMessageDateSlot
property.label: No Data Message
property.default: Select a partner location to see the available slots.
property.description: Message to be shown when no data is available.

property.name: noDataMessageTimeSlot
property.label: Time Slot No Data Message
property.default: Select a Date Slot to see the available Time Slots.
property.description: Message to be shown when no data is available.

property.name: daysCount
property.label: Days Count
property.description: Number of days to show.

property.name: branchId
property.label: Branch
property.description: Branch of which capcity needs to be shown.

property.name: titlePartnerPanel
property.label: Title
property.description: Title of the panel to be shown on top.

property.name: recordFieldsetNamePartnerPanel
property.label: Branch Fieldset
property.description: The Branch fieldset to be used to show location details.

property.name: showFilterPanelPartnerPanel
property.label: Show Filter Panel
property.description: Show or Hide the Filter Panel.

property.name: noDataMessagePartnerPanel
property.label: No Data Message
property.description: Message to be shown when no data is available.

property.name: titleRecordPanel
property.label: Title
property.description: Title of the panel to be shown on top.

property.name: objectApiNameRecordPanel
property.label: Object Api Name
property.description: Object Api Name to show records for.

property.name: recordFieldsetNameRecordPanel
property.label: Record Fieldset
property.description: The fieldset to be used to show fields.

property.name: defaultFieldValuesRecordPanel
property.label: Default Field Values
property.description: The default values to pupulate record with.
